ERROR.general: The request could not be satisfied
ERROR.401: Authorization is not possible, has failed or has not yet been provided
ERROR.403: The server refuses to respond because the client does not have the appropriate privileges
ERROR.405: The request was made using an unsupported application method
ERROR.408: You have exceeded the time limit in returning answer
ERROR.409: The request could not be processed due to a conflict with the current state of the resource
ERROR.formato_documento_pdf: The format of the chosen file is not pdf
ERROR.error_subir_documento: An error ocurred uploading the documents, please try again.
ERROR.error_cargar_documento: An error ocurred downloading the documents, please try again.
ERROR.rol_insuficiente_titulo: The user does not have permissions
ERROR.rol_insuficiente: The user does not have sufficient permissions to use the system .
ERROR.fallo_informacion_en: There was an error querying the information about
ERROR.sin_informacion_en: No information has been found about
ERROR.persiste_error_comunique_OAS: Please return and try again later. If the error persists, contact the Technology and Information Advisory Office (Oficina Asesora de Tecnologías e Información)
ERROR.error_previsualizar_doc: The document could not be viewed, it is not a valid format, or it was not found.
